info.name: Google Classroom: Hide Unenroll option
info.description: In the Google Classroom Classes page, hide the "Unenroll" button from the class card dropdowns so that kids don't have a visible option to remove themselves from the class.
info.additionalInfo: My son kept "unenrolling" himself from his classes. So I created this to hide that option since the school was unable to prevent it and it caused issues with his assignments even once he was added back to the class.
